title: easybits
author: easybits
content: We buy and sell all kind of cryptocurrency since 2016 through Localbitcoins, Paxful and Binance.We don't have a fixed rate but it depends on payment method and amount.Primarily we accept bank transfers, credit cards, Paysend, Western Union, Paypal fnf and Advanced Cash.Please start a private chat with your requested amounts and exchange requirements.

comments.author: easybits
comments.body: Chat with us on Whatsapp, Telegram or Messenger
